uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.model.data

Interface NamedFilterProvider<T>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NamedFilterWrapper, ReferenceServiceFilterComposite, ServiceFilterComposite

    public interface NamedFilterProvider<T>
    Interface for classes (Normally DataObjectFactorys or Composites) that can generate named filters. This is intended as a standard mechanism to give access to standard un-parameterised filters (that would normally be generated by methods) in text driven code. It is primarily used to dynamically define relationships that should only apply when the target object is in a particular state.
    Author:
    spb
    See Also:
    AccessRoleProvider
